name: brad_frost (@brad_frost@mastodon.social)
summary:
Tools are fantastic, we absolutely want tooling to continue to improve, and automating certain tasks make sense. BUT! Too often we see teams looking to tools as a panacea to solve their human problems.

Having the most sophisticated, automated tooling in place doesn't guarantee success. Can tools help? Absolutely. But above all, work hard to build relationships and foster a culture of collaboration and communication.
